QuestData.Title: Message from the West
QuestData.Description: <Torvus shakes your hand, giving you a letter in the process.>$B$B<Torvus speaks under his breath.>$B$BJust play along, $n.$B$BIt is good to see you here, soldier! Lord Hellscream has undoubtedly sent his strongest warriors to Lord Agmar!$B$B<Torvus speaks under his breath.>$B$BRead it and then destroy it in the fire pot next to me.
QuestData.AreaDescription: Letter from Saurfang read and destroyed
QuestData.LogDescription: Read the Letter from Saurfang and then destroy it.$B$BSpeak to Messenger Torvus once you have completed this task.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak to Messenger Torvus at Agmar's Hammer in Dragonblight.
QuestData.RewardText: <Torvus nods at you.>$B$BSo we are understood? I will return to my lord and tell him that you have accepted.
